repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issue of The Summer News and Hilltopper. They contained news and articles about summer programs at Tufts. The Tufts Summer News, a student newspaper, was created in July 1946 and existed until August 1948, when for its fourth volume it was retitled the Tufts Hilltopper. The Tufts Hilltopper continued production until 1971.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Responsibility for new student orientation once fell under the pervue of the Orientation Committee. Currently, the Office for Campus Life takes a leadership role in the planning and implementation of New Student Orientation.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains issues of The Tufts Summer News. It was created in July 1946, and existed until August 1948, when, for its fourth volume, it was retitled the Tufts Hilltopper. The Tufts Hilltopper continued production until 1971.
